item.description:
Hi Members,

1) Our next Meetup will be on December 6th, 3-5pm, at Holliston Meadows, 140 Summer St., Holliston, MA. (508) 429 1500.

All small dogs are invited. Please RSVP and let me know what food/beverage you can bring.

2) Best Friends in Sudbury has asked me to change the timing at that site to 11 am - 1 pm, on Sundays. Since I am not available at that time, if anyone else would like to step forward to help me organize that meet, I would be glad to have help. Otherwise, I will discontinue meetups there.

Have a very Happy Thanksgiving!!

Tiny Dog best,
Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE & TINY DOG MEETUP, December 6th, Sunday, Holliston Meadows, 3-5pm
